definition: water plants/habitat with water source and grass
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Where the rivers run clear and the bracken is gold in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 這裏，溪流清澈明淨，水草在陽光下閃着金色的波光。

sentences.english: Is mum behind the float grass . It is a sea horse.
sentences.chinese: 看看水草後面有沒有媽媽？原來是小海馬。

sentences.english: A satellite image of the sands and seaweed in the Bahamas.
sentences.chinese: 一幅關於巴哈馬沙礫和水草的衛星圖像。

sentences.english: You must have put too much duckweed in the tank.
sentences.chinese: 您一定在水箱內放了過多的水草。

sentences.english: Here the water was abundant and the grass luxuriant, which made the sheep grow fat.
sentences.chinese: 這兒水草肥美，讓它們長得肥滾滾的。

sentences.english: Too much duckweed is likely to choke the fish.
sentences.chinese: 太多的水草可能會使魚窒息。

sentences.english: Egrets paced holding legs in the water plants.
sentences.chinese: 白鷺舉着長腿在水草裏踱步。

sentences.english: Yanqi is a beautiful place with dense water meadows where wild geese nest and breed.
sentences.chinese: 雁棲，一個水草豐美，大雁棲息繁衍的地方。

sentences.english: Patches of weeds float on the water.
sentences.chinese: 一片片的水草漂浮在水面上。

sentences.english: My fishing line get entangled with weeds.
sentences.chinese: 我的釣魚線和水草纏在一起了。

sentences.english: He saw buffaloes dive beneath the floodwater to nibble grass.
sentences.chinese: 他看見水牛潛到水下逐食水草。

sentences.english: There is plump float grass. Let they grow plump.
sentences.chinese: 這兒水草肥美，讓他們長得肥滾滾的。

definition: edge of the water/waterside/shore (of sea, lake or river)
Hunei township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
